H0.text: Which musical instrument is Albert Schweitzer known to have played. Piano

H1.text: Which musical instrument is Albert Schweitzer known to have played. Violin

H2.text: Which musical instrument is Albert Schweitzer known to have played. Cello

H3.text: Which musical instrument is Albert Schweitzer known to have played. Organ

A4.text: Schweitzer studied organ in Mulhouse from 1885 to 1893 with Eug√®ne Munch, organist at the Protestant cathedral, who inspired Schweitzer with his enthusiasm for the music of German composer Richard Wagner.

A5.text: Schweitzer rapidly gained prominence as a musical scholar and organist, dedicated also to the rescue, restoration and study of historic pipe organs.
